section.title: Overview
section.para: The module extends the presence server implementation, providing the ability to handle the 'ua-profile' event. When a user agent subscribes to ua-profile event for its own AoR, it retrieves the profile data document from the body of a NOTIFY request.
The profile data document format is usually specific to the user agent. Such documents have to be built and added to presentity table by either the admin or a third party application.

Warning: When you add a profile data document (i.e. the user agent's provisioning config) to the presentity table, you must make sure that you set the presentity table expires field to a time value far in the future.
Read more about SIP user agent configuration framework in RFC6080: http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6080.

section.title: &kamailio; Modules
section.para:
The following modules must be loaded before this module:
presence.

section.title: default_expires (int)
section.para: The default expires value used when missing from SUBSCRIBE message (in seconds).

section.title: Exported Functions
section.para: None to be used in configuration file.
